features: ★Battleskin ANTIFUNGAL TEA TREE BAR SOAP：The natural castile soap bar is a Foot and Body Odor eliminator that soothes Man/Woman/Athlete's Foot, Toe Nails, Candida, Ringworm, Jock Itch, Acne, and Other Skin Irritations. Our Tea Tree hand soap bar SMELLS GREAT, is balanced for all skin types and gives you a fresh tingling sensation. More than an organic soap bar, it is a cleaning and beauty soap. You can use it in your daily life for face, body, and hand.

★ ORGANIC & NATURAL BODY WASH INGREDIENTS: The tea tree body wash soap is great for Outdoor people & Athletes who are active in soccer, basketball, CrossFit, martial arts, running, cycling, yoga, Pilates, MMA (mixed martial arts), boxing, football, or workout regularly at the gym. Our man and woman body soap are gentle enough to be used daily. Throw a bar soap bulk for women and men into your gym bag and use it regularly. Strong Enough for the Gym - Gentle Enough to Use Every Day!

★ SOOTHES DRY, ITCHY, CRACKED, FLAKY, SKIN: Our Premium Body Soap bar natural Solution Contains unique essential oil mix, which includes tea tree oil, eucalyptus oil, and lavender oil. and other essential oils that Help Soothe Foot and Body, Skin Irritations on your Face, Hands, Heels, Toenails, Elbow, Back, Chest, and Butt. Men and women with acne and eczema use our moisturizing body wash for cleaner feeling skin.

★SKIN BARRIER: Our beauty bar soap with essential oils with natural therapeutical effects. Teatree oil and eucalyptus oil has been shown to have therapeutical effects on all kinds of skin infections caused by bacteria and fungus. In addition, lavender will decrease stress.

★GUARANTEE OF SAFETY: our bar soap has no Chemical Harmful Preservatives, Petroleum, fragrances, dyes or other harsh ingredients. And If you don't like our products, please tell us and we will give you a replacement order or refund no-questions-asked. We strive to ensure that all of our customers are completely satisfied.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pure Natural Ingredient Essential Oil Made from tea leaves, eucalyptus leaves and lavenders that gently cleanse the skin, leaving it clean and not sticky.Contains lavender essential oil to give out a fresh and elegant fragrance, which will give you a good smell after use and make your mood peaceful. Wash Hands Wash hands daily with our antifungal soap Wash Face Keep your face clean and germ-free use our natural ingredients beauty soap Wash Body Use our soap to clean many parts of your body such as Heels, Elbow, Back, Chest, and Butt to prevent skin infections Natural Ingredients Wash Hands Wash Face Wash Body

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I don't have a problem with my odor but I noticed it took longer for me to start smell other than I just stepped out of the shower. Very soapy I love it. Will definitely order more in the future. Leavea my skin soft and I feel fresh when I get out the shower. Zero complaints. Light smell on skin after use. Will not interfere with your smell goods lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Definitely surprised with this bar of soap I've used it for 3 days now I have no complaints my skin is not dry my skin's not dull I don't feel like my hand skids across my skin there's no residue it lathers up really really good smells amazing in the scent lasts on my skin I actually had a customer comment me how good I smelt and it was the soap highly recommend it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: First of all I love the smell of the soap. It really does lather as said. I showered and left on my skin for about 3 minutes. It feels rather drying when you rinse it off but overall my skin just felt much cleaner. Will definitely purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have had problems with my man parts getting really red and irritated from to much moisture nothing ever worked to heal the area until I got this soap. I am impressed with the results plus it smells really good too. Highly recommend for your two fellas it’s really worth every penny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love it leaves me feeling and smelling fresh

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars VERY strong floral scent
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this soap for three weeks now. The first thing I noticed, before even opening the package, was the scent - it's so strong! I like some floral scents, but this one is... not great. While I definitely feel cleaner after using the soap, it hasn't done much for the odors I was hoping it'd eliminate. It has helped to clear up some discolored spots I've had on my torso for several years, though, so there's that.Update: Had to stop using the soap. The smell is too strong and unpleasant and it was staining my entire soap tray blue. Not worth it at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works on chapped skin folds
reviews.reviewText: Gentle and heals moist skin areas

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I just bought this soap. The first thing that I liked was the smell.
